item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48332 - fixed XSSFSheet autoSizeColumn() to tolerate empty RichTextString

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48332 - fixed ColumnInfoRecord to tolerate missing reserved field

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47701 - fixed RecordFormatException when reading list subrecords (LbsDataSubRecord)

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : memory usage optimization in XSSF - avoid creating parentless xml beans

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47188 - avoid corruption of workbook when adding cell comments

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48106 - improved work with cell comments in XSSF

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : Add support for creating SummaryInformation and DocumentSummaryInformation properties on POIDocuments that don't have them, via POIDocument.createInformationProperties()

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48180 - be more forgiving of short chart records, which skip some unused fields

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48274 - fix erronious wrapping of byte colours in HSSFPalette.findSimilarColor

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48269 - fix fetching of error codes from XSSF formula cells

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48229 - fixed javadoc for HSSFSheet.setColumnWidth and XSSFSheet setColumnWidth

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47757 - fixed XLSX2CSV to avoid exception when processing cells with multiple "t" elements

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48195 - short-circuit evaluation of IF() and CHOOSE()

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48161 - support for text extraction from PPT master slides

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47970 - added a method to set arabic mode in HSSFSheet

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48134 - release system resources when using Picture.resize()

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48087 - avoid NPE in XSSFChartSheet when calling methods of the superclass

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48038 - handle reading HWPF stylesheets from non zero offsets

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : When running the "compile-ooxml-xsds" ant task, also generate the source jar for the OOXML Schemas

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 45672 - improve handling by MissingRecordAwareHSSFListener of records that cover multiple cells (MulBlankRecord and MulRKRecord)

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48096 - relaxed validation check in RecalcIdRecord

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48085 - improved error checking in BlockAllocationTableReader to trap unreasonable field values

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47924 - fixed logic for matching cells and comments in HSSFCell.getCellComment()

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47942 - added implementation of protection features to XLSX and DOCX files

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48070 - preserve leading and trailing white spaces in XSSFRichTextString

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48044 - added implementation for CountBlank function

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 48036 - added IntersectionEval to allow evaluation of the intersection formula operator

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47999 - avoid un-needed call to the JVM Garbage Collector when working on OOXML OPC Packages

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47922 - added example HSMF application that converts a .msg file to text and extracts attachments

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47903 - added Ant target to compile scratchpad examples

item.title: add
item.description: add by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47839 - improved API for OOXML custom properties

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47862 - fixed XSSFSheet.setColumnWidth to handle columns included in a column span

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47804 - fixed XSSFSheet.setColumnHidden to handle columns included in a column span

item.title: fix
item.description: fix by POI-DEVELOPERS : 47889 - fixed XSSFCell.getStringCellValue() to properly handle cached formula results
